my_package package¶

Submodules¶

my_package.data_dict module¶

class my_package.data_dict.DataDict(mail_dicts, max_rep=10)¶

Bases: object

This class takes a list of emails & duplicates them and then writes the duplicated data to a csv file.

duplicate_data : duplicates the list of emails randomly

write_dup_data : writes the duplicated data to a csv file

mail_dicts : list of email dicts

max_rep : max no. of times an email is to
duplicated(default: 10)
duplicate_data()¶

Duplicates the list of emails.

This function randomly duplicates each entry in the list of emails. Then adds them to duplicated_dict_list, followed by shuffling it.

write_dup_data(file_name)¶

This function writes the duplicated data to a csv file.

file_name: csv file name where the duplicated data is to be saved.

my_package.get_relations module¶

class my_package.get_relations.EmailRelations(data_dicts, max_rep, csv_fname, dot_fname, png_fname)¶

Bases: object

Creates a png file describing relations based on emails list.

create_relations_image : Creates a png file describing
relations based on emails list.

data_dicts : list of email dicts

max_rep : max no. of times an email is to
duplicated.

csv_fname : name of csv file where data is stored.

dot_fname : name of dot where intermediate graph is stored.

png_fname : name of png file with the final graph.

create_relations_image()¶

Creates a png file describing relations based on emails list.

my_package.make_graph module¶

class my_package.make_graph.MakeGraphFile(dot_file, png_file)¶

Bases: object

This class is used to create a graph out of the list of emails.

This class reads the duplicated list of emails, then creates a Directed Graph out of it, using NetworkX library. Finally, it creates a .png file for the graph.

make_nx_graph : creates a NetworkX graph based on the list
of emails

write_dot_file : writes the Directed Graph to a dot file

write_png_file : creates a .png file from the dot file

mail_dicts : list of email dicts

max_rep : max no. of times an email is to
duplicated(default: 10)
make_nx_graph(mails_data)¶

Creates a Directed Graph based on email data.

This function takes the duplicated emails list, then creates a Directed Graph out of them using NetworkX library. The weight of each edge is the number of times the value is duplicated.

mails_data : list of email dicts

write_dot_file(mails_data)¶

Creates a Graph from the list of emails, then writes the NetworkX graph to a dot file.

mails_data: list of email dicts

write_png_file()¶

Create a .png file from the dot file saved previously.

my_package.process_data module¶

class my_package.process_data.ProcessData(file_name)¶

Bases: object

This class processes the duplicated data.

read_data : read the duplicated data from csv file

process_data : process the duplicated data from csv file

file_name : name of csv file where emails are stored

process_data()¶

Reads the csv file for emails and get counts of emails.

This function reads the duplicated data from a csv file. Then using Counter from collections modules, it gets the count of each unique entry.

mail_count : A dictionary with key as email entry and the
value as it’s frequency.
read_data()¶

Reads the csv file into a list of emails.
